functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Scroll Storage Key\",\"color\":\"white\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"Hidden by Iedilgaurd the Grey after","color":"gray"}','{"text":"the Siege of New Hoiro to keep","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Ixinik\'s scrolls from the reapers, for","color":"gray"}','{"text":"not even she could stand up to the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"onslaught of reapers.","color":"gray"}']}}
